title: these 2 guys on my team and tryna troll to ruin everyone PROVISIONAL MATCHES PLEASE BAN

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: read combos and the matches and you'll see and there kda and no sense of gameplay or effort towards anyone

replies.body:
The Teemo player looks like he was intentionally feeding. Report and forget.

The Evelynn player, though, looked like they were actually trying. Don't report a player just because they didn't have the skill in a particular match. [Here is an article listing all the reasons you **can't** use for reporting a player.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h2)

Best of luck in your future matches!
